topic.topicTitle: Editing individual Student or Teacher Accounts
topic.topicDialog:
At some point in the year, you may need to edit a Student or Teacher account, either to reset their password or amend their access.

If you'd like to edit multiple Student or Teacher accounts, please have a look at the Editing Multiple Accounts tutorials.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Switch to Admin mode button at the top of the screen and re-enter your password to access the Admin area.

In the list of accounts, find the name of the Teacher or Student you need to edit - you can search for an individual by name, or filter them by Role or Year and Registration Class.

Clicking on an individual's name will display their details in the right hand panel.
You'll then be able to overwrite any of their information as needed.
Once you've made the changes, click Save Changes.
The changes you have made will appear immediately.
